Package com.flipfit.business

Interface customerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomerService
public interface customerInterface
The CustomerInterface defines the contract for all customer-related operations. Any class that implements this interface must provide the functionality for viewing bookings, browsing centers, booking slots, making payments, and editing personal details.
Author:

  • Method Details

    • viewBookedSlots

      List<Booking> viewBookedSlots(int customerId)
      Retrieves a list of all booked slots for a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The unique ID of the customer whose bookings are to be viewed.
      Returns:
      A list of Booking objects representing the customer's booked slots.

    • viewCenters

      List<GymCentre> viewCenters()
      Fetches a list of all available and approved gym centers.
      Returns:
      A list of GymCentre objects representing the available gyms.

    • bookSlot

      void bookSlot(int customerId, int gymId, int slotId, LocalDate bookingDate)
      Books a new slot for a customer at a specific gym center.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer making the booking.
      gymId - The ID of the gym center where the slot is located.
      slotId - The ID of the slot being booked.
      bookingDate - The date for which the slot is being booked.

    • makePayments

      void makePayments(int customerId, int balance)
      Processes a customer's payment and updates their wallet balance.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer making the payment.
      balance - The balance to be added to wallet.

    • retrieveBalance

      Integer retrieveBalance(int customerId) throws AuthenticationException
      Retrieves a customer's balance.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The customer's user ID.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the balance.
      Throws:
      AuthenticationException - if the user ID is invalid.

    • editCustomerDetails

      void editCustomerDetails(int userId, User updatedUser, Customer updatedCustomer)
      Updates user and customer details.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user (customer) whose details are to be updated.
      updatedUser - An object containing the new User details.
      updatedCustomer - An object containing the new Customer details.

    • editPaymentDetails

      void editPaymentDetails(int userId, int paymentType, String paymentInfo)
      Updates a customer's payment-specific details.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user (customer).
      paymentType - The new payment type.
      paymentInfo - The new payment information.
